mapper.select: SELECT R.REC_CD , R.STU_NO , R.RGB_CD , R.REC_YR , R.REC_SEM , R.REC_PER , R.REC_RSN , R.REC_DT , CD.COMD_NM AS REC_YN , R.REC_REJ FROM RECORD R, STUDENT S, COMMON_DETAIL CD, COMMON C WHERE R.STU_NO = S.STU_NO AND CD.COM_CD = C.COM_CD AND CD.COMD_CD = R.REC_YN AND R.STU_NO = #{stuNo}

SELECT R.REC_CD , R.STU_NO , R.RGB_CD , R.REC_YR , R.REC_SEM , R.REC_PER , R.REC_RSN , R.REC_DT , CD.COMD_NM AS REC_YN , R.REC_REJ FROM RECORD R LEFT OUTER JOIN COUNSEL CS ON R.REC_CD = CS.REC_CD, STUDENT S, COMMON_DETAIL CD, COMMON C WHERE R.STU_NO = S.STU_NO AND CD.COM_CD = C.COM_CD AND CD.COMD_CD = R.REC_YN AND R.STU_NO = #{stuNo} AND CS.REC_CD IS NULL
